title: Add downloadable CV to portfolio

requirements.text: Add the uploaded CV file (Engr. Jerry E. Osiobe CV.pdf) as a static asset in the frontend/public/assets/ directory

quotes: Attached my CV to my portfolio and make it downloadable

acceptanceCriteria: CV PDF file is stored in frontend/public/assets/ directory
File is accessible via the frontend public assets path

requirements.text: Add a download CV button in the HeroSection component that triggers download of the CV PDF file when clicked

quotes: Attached my CV to my portfolio and make it downloadable

acceptanceCriteria: Download button is visually integrated into the HeroSection component near contact information
Button has appropriate icon (e.g., Download icon from lucide-react)
Clicking the button initiates download of the CV PDF file
Button styling matches the portfolio's design system with teal accent colors
Button includes accessible label text such as 'Download CV' or 'Download Resume'

requirements.text: Ensure the CV download button is responsive and displays appropriately on mobile, tablet, and desktop screen sizes
acceptanceCriteria: Button is visible and accessible on all screen sizes
Button positioning adapts to the responsive layout of the HeroSection
Touch targets meet mobile usability standards (minimum 44x44px)

constraints: Do not modify immutable frontend paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
Maintain consistency with existing portfolio design system (teal/slate color scheme, OKLCH color variables)
Preserve existing HeroSection layout and contact information display
nonGoals: Backend storage or dynamic CV upload functionality
CV preview or inline viewing (only download required)
Multiple CV versions or language variants
